name: Kontakt Snapshot File
summary: An NKSN file is a snapshot of a Kontakt instrument ( .NKI file) used by Kontakt Player, a free sample player based on Kontakt. It contains the state of an instrument in the Kontakt Snapshot (NKSN) format, functioning similarly to instrument presets. Kontakt Player users can save snapshots of instruments as NKSN files to reuse them across different projects or computers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
